app.name: Street Fighter 3.3
app.author: RetroArch mod by R-Sam
app.long_description:
One-click run Street Fighter III 3rd Strike.
Channel Forwarders are stored in wad/sfiii3.
The original files are shared by "saulfabreg Wii VC - Official" on YouTube.
Website: https://github.com/duxiuxing/r-sam-cps3

arguments.arg: sd:/Games/Arcade (FB Alpha 2012 CPS-3)/Street Fighter III 3rd Strike - Fight for the Future
